SMW Subobject for EmptyHigh Alchemy value: 6Examine: It's a bailing bucket.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Bailing bucketUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Bailing bucket.pngWeight: 1.000Value: 10Version anchor: EmptyRelease date: 28 July 2003Item ID: 583

A bailing bucket is used in the Fishing Trawler minigame. Its sole purpose is to bail water out of the trawler. It is recommended for all players to have this item before going on a fishing trawler trip, as there is always a need to bail at least once.

You can obtain this item from the Khazard General Store close to the Fishing Trawler. Rasolo west of the Fishing Guild also sells some but he is slightly out of the way. It is not sold anywhere else.

It cannot be used in place of a regular bucket, and likewise a regular bucket cannot be used in place of a bailing bucket.

Its default option is to bail. When this option is used outside of the minigame, a player gets this message: I don't really need to bail yet.

Casting the Lunar spell Humidify will not fill the bucket.
